name: Lucky bhaskar
starring: Dulquer Salmaan, Meenakshi Chaudhary, and Ramki
desc: A middle-class bank clerk who longs to trade stability for adventure gets more than he bargained for when he unexpectedly becomes a wealthy man

name: Devara
starring: NTR Jr., Saif Ali Khan, and Janhvi Kapoor
desc: A mighty sea warrior takes a violent stand against the criminal deeds of his village. Years later, his mild-mannered son walks a path of his own

name: GOAT
starring: Vijay, Prashanth, and Prabhu Deva
desc: He was his agency's top hostage negotiator, field agent and spy — but years after retiring, one mission brings his past back to haunt him and his family.

name: Meiyazhagan
starring: Karthi, Arvind Swamy, and Sri Divya
desc: A man makes a bittersweet journey back to his hometown after 22 years and meets an insistent yet kindhearted relative whose name he can't remember

name: We can Be Heroes
starring: YaYa Gosselin, Pedro Pascal, and Priyanka Chopra Jonas
desc: When alien invaders capture Earth’s superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents — and the planet

name: A Dog's Way Home
starring: Ben Ratner, Jonah Hauer-King, and Spencer Dreve
desc: A devoted, homesick dog goes on a treacherous journey across the American heartland to be reunited with her owner

name: The super mario Bros.Movie
starring: Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, and Charlie Day
desc: Magically teleported from Brooklyn to the Mushroom Kingdom, two plucky plumbers team up with a princess to battle a tyrannical fire-breathing turtle

name: The Angry Birds Movie 2
starring: Jason Sudeikis, Rachel Bloom, and Leslie Jones
desc: Enemies turn into frenemies when the Pigs call for a truce with the Birds to unite against a formidable new foe that’s threatening all of their homes

name: The sea beast
starring: Karl Urban, Zaris-Angel Hator, and Jared Harris
desc: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters — and make history to boot.

name: LEO
starring: Adam Sandler, Bill Burr, and Cecily Strong
desc: Adam Sandler is a lizard named Leo in this coming-of-age musical comedy about the last year of elementary school as seen through the eyes of a class pet.

name: Goosebumps
starring: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, and Odeya Rush
desc: A teen is glum about moving to a small town until he falls for his new neighbor. But her dad is a horror writer whose scary world soon turns real

name: Spy kids:Armageddon
starring: Gina Rodriguez, Zachary Levi, and Connor Esterson
desc: When a game developer unleashes a powerful computer virus, the children of two secret agents must work together to save their parents — and the world.

name: Laapataa Ladies
starring: Nitanshi Goel, Pratibha Ranta, and Sparsh Shrivastava
desc: Mistakenly swapped en route to their new husbands' homes, two brides navigate their unexpected surroundings, making delightful self-discovery journeys

name: Khel khel Mein
starring: Akshay Kumar, Taapsee Pannu, and Vaani Kapoor
desc: An unhappily married couple and five friends decide to share every call or text they get over one night with each other. There's nothing to hide — right?

name: crew
starring: Tabu, Kareena Kapoor, and Kriti Sanon
desc: When their airline faces bankruptcy, three desperate flight attendants resort to a high-flying gold smuggling ring to keep their careers afloat.

name: Dunki
starring: Shah Rukh Khan, Taapsee Pannu, and Boman Irani
desc: When his friends in Punjab struggle to clear the immigration process, an ex-soldier guides them on a risky journey to enter the UK without permission.

name: Wild wild Punjab
starring: Varun Sharma, Sunny Singh, and Manjot Singh
desc: Four friends road-trip across Punjab to help one of them get over an ex-girlfriend, but are quickly caught in a fiasco like no other.

name: Adios Amigos
starring: Asif Ali, Suraj Venjaramoodu
desc: When fate brings two strangers from different worlds together, they go on an impromptu journey, learning about life and each other along the way.

name: Aay
starring: Narne Nithin, Rajkumar Kasireddy, and Ankith Koyya
desc: When a man comes home between COVID lockdowns, he connects with old friends and falls for a woman who feels influenced by her caste while finding love.

name: Murder Mubharak
starring: Pankaj Tripathi, Sara Ali Khan, and Vijay Varma
desc: When a gym trainer is murdered at an elite Delhi club, a wily investigator unravels the sordid secrets of its ultrarich members to find the killer.

name: Dream Girl 2
starring: Ayushmann Khurrana, Ananya Panday, and Paresh Rawal
desc: Karam secretly turns his female alter ego into a dancer and woos a millionaire's son in hopes of paying family debts and impressing his fiancée's father.

name: chillar party
starring: Irfan Khan, Raju, and Sanath Menon
desc: Eight feisty boys befriend young drifter Fatka. When a mean politician threatens Fatka's way of life, the boys band together in honor of their pal.

name: Mad
starring: Sangeeth Shoban, Ram Nithin, and Narne Nithin
desc: Youthful hijinks, romance and lifelong friendships are all part of the curriculum as Manoj, Ashok and Damodar — aka the MAD squad — cope with college

name: Article 370
starring: Yami Gautam, Priyamani, and Vaibhav Tatwawaadi
desc: Ahead of a major constitutional decision, special agent Zooni Haksar is tasked with a secret mission to quell violence in a conflict-ridden region

name: Under paris
starring: Bérénice Bejo, Nassim Lyes, and Léa Léviant
desc: In order to save Paris from an international bloodbath, a grieving scientist is forced to face her tragic past when a giant shark appears in the Seine

name: The Meg
starring: Jason Statham, Li Bingbing, and Rainn Wilson
desc: When an attack leaves a research crew trapped at the bottom of the sea, a rescue diver must face a massive predator long presumed extinct to save them.

name: Leo(Hindi)
starring: Vijay, Sanjay Dutt, and Arjun
desc: Violently pursued by criminals who insist he's a former gangster, a humble cafe owner fights to shield his family — and the truth about his identity

name: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba
starring: Taapsee Pannu, Vikrant Massey, and Sunny Kaushal
desc: While evading the cops in Agra, Rani and Rishu scheme to run away together. But when their plans go awry, Rani asks a mild-mannered admirer for help

name: Dont Breathe 2
starring: Stephen Lang, Brendan Sexton III, and Madelyn Grace
desc: A self-reliant blind veteran trains his adopted daughter to face any danger, but they're both ambushed when a vengeful stranger arrives from the past.

name: Thanksgiving
starring: Patrick Dempsey, Nell Verlaque, and Addison Rae
desc: One year after a Black Friday tragedy, a ruthless killer stalks Plymouth, Massachusetts to exact bloody revenge — one complicit resident at a time
